Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Quintessential \Quin`tes*sen"tial\, a. Of the nature of a quintessence; purest; most characteristic. ``Quintessential extract of mediocrity.'' --G. Eliot. [1913 Webster]
quintessential adj : representing the perfect example of a class or quality
